Package org.elkoserver.server.gatekeeper.passwd

A simple, password-based Authorizer implementation for use with the Elko Gatekeeper.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
PasswdAuthorizer A simple implementation of the Authorizer interface for use with the Elko Gatekeeper.
 

Package org.elkoserver.server.gatekeeper.passwd Description

A simple, password-based Authorizer implementation for use with the Elko Gatekeeper. It maintains an access control database using a set of JSON objects that map Actor names to SHA hashes of passwords, much in the style of a Unix passwd file.
